result.execSummary:
The defendant Craig A Milton was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed
supervisions.notes: Consecutive to: *To cases 14CM2236 and 14CM4626 and as to any other sentence in the HOC. Straight Time.

miscConds.notes:
*Court waived all waiverable costs with the mandatory costs due during period of probation. Failure to pay shall result in a civil judgment with tax intercept.
*Restitution set at ZERO.
*NO contact with the Walgreens located on Marquette University Campus, 1600 West Wisconsin Avenue, in the City of Milwaukee, Milwaukee County, Wisconsin.

*Cooperate with agent.
*Mental Health Assessment with follow up care and treatment.
*Take all prescribed medications.

*Absolute Sobriety.
*AODA Assessment with follow up care and treatment.

timeConds.notes: Concurrent with: With 14CM2236 and 14CM4626. Straight Time, Forthwith.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Craig A Milton

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt:
Statements made as to sentencing by both counsel and Defendant.

AS TO COUNT 1:  COURT SENTENCED Defendant to 180 DAYS, STRAIGHT TIME, to run consecutive to cases 14CM002236 and 14CM004626; and as to any other sentence in the House of Correction (HOC) with credit for 0 days time served. 

Court IMPOSED AND STAYED the sentence and placed Defendant on Probation with the State of Wisconsin, Department of Corrections for a period of 2 YEARS to run concurrent to cases 14CM002236 and 14CM004626 with the following conditions as to Probation:
*  Cooperate with agent.
*  Court WAIVED all waiverable costs with the mandatory costs due during the period of probation. Failure to pay shall result in a Civil Judgment with tax intercept.
*  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
*  AODA assessment with follow up care and treatment.
*  Mental Health assessment with follow up care and treatment.
*  Take all prescribed medications.
*  Restitution set at ZERO.
*  No contact with the Walgreens located on Marquette University Campus, 1600 West Wisconsin Avenue, in the City of Milwaukee, Milwaukee County, Wisconsin.

CONDITION OF PROBATION:  COURT SENTENCED Defendant to serve 120 DAYS, STRAIGHT TIME, FORTHWITH, Condition time in the House of Correction (HOC), to run concurrent to cases 14CM002236 and 14CM004626. 

Received and filed with court:
*  Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief Form

Defendant Craig A Milton in court with attorney Alexis B Stewart.  Defendant Craig A Milton in custody.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant waived rights and pled GUILTY.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire received and filed.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Parties stipulate to the facts of the complaint as a basis for a guilty plea.  Court found the Defendant guilty as charged in the complaint.  Judgment of Conviction entered. Parties are prepared to proceed with sentencing.

Attorney Alexis B Stewart in court, defendant Craig A Milton not in court, in custody and not produced.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Status conference held off the record.  Defense counsel has received discovery and offer.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37. Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 23, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Bail motion by defense argued and denied by the Court.

Attorney Alexis B Stewart in court, defendant Craig A Milton not in court, in custody and not produced.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. For reasons stated on the record,   Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37.  Status conference scheduled for June 30, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Alexis B Stewart in court, defendant Craig A Milton not in court, in custody and not produced.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Bail motion by defense argued and denied by the Court. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with  Walgreens

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/DEFENDANT to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers.    The court ordered defendant no possession of drugs without a valid prescription.

Defendant Craig A Milton in court with attorney Patrick Dennis Wait.  Defendant Craig A Milton in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Court ordered case adjourned for bail/bond hearing in Branch 37.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for 05-27-2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
